name: Electro Heist
description:
.EXE and project files are broken. the fixed version can be found Here

"The robbery game you didn't know you wanted".

Electro Heist is a car chase game about keeping your distance as you hack a self driving car.

As more and more people are investing in the electric self driving cars has anyone ever wondered: "Do you think we can steal them while they are running?"

Don't worry! Electro Heist has you covered. now you can experience on the road theft  without leaving the comfort of your own home. Electro Heist simulates crude vehicle physics and 12 car colour variations to suit all of your car heisting needs.

 All you have to do is keep an eye on your distance and hack meter. Between 10-40m is where you will get a good enough signal. Too close and the AI will notice, Too far and you will get out of range.

ControlsThrottle & reverseW  /  SSteeringA  /  DBrakesLeft ShiftHandbrakeSpaceChange perspectiveLeft ClickFullscreenF11Return to main menuRDebug modeT
